title: The Legend of Byamee
creator_credit: Eltham Films, Patrick Ryan and Tim Burstall
brief_description: Contemporary aboriginal bark paintings from Arnhem Land illustrate the story of the decline of the Aborigines. Byamee, a sky hero from the Dream Time, made the first earth men and taught them all they know, but the black people did not follow his instructions and the white devils took over the continent.
